summary.span: 保留資料繫結運算式和靜態常值文字。

span.span: Retains data-binding expressions and static literal text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別仍然存在的值及其屬性來檢視狀態。The class persists the value of its property to view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立一個類別，取得物件，並顯示物件的屬性。The following code example creates a class that obtains a object and displays the property of the object. MemberSignature.Value: string System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text { get; set; }

property System::String ^ System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的文字內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the text content of the object.
A that represents the text content of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作介面傳回的值屬性。This implementation of the interface returns the value of the property. 值屬性會持續保留在檢視狀態。The value of the property is persisted in the view state. 物件會實作，但不支援`set`方法屬性。The object implements but does not support the `set` method on the property. 所有嘗試都使用此方法會都傳回例外狀況。All attempts to use this method will return a exception.

span.span: An attempt to set the value is made.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Text { get; }
.property instance string Text
Public ReadOnly Property Text As String
public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件的文字內容。

span.span: Gets the text content of the object.
A that represents the text content of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別仍然存在的值及其屬性來檢視狀態。The class persists the value of its property to view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立自訂控制項，並使用.aspx 檔案內從該控制項顯示的文字物件。The following code example creates a custom control and uses that control from within an .aspx file to display the text of a object. 自訂控制項取得物件，並將輸出中的文字屬性其`Render`方法。The custom control obtains a object and outputs the text property in its `Render` method. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl/CS/mydataboundliteralcontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl/VB/mydataboundliteralcontrol.vb#1)] 您可以編譯 Visual Basic 編譯器 (vbc.exe) 或 C# 編譯器 (csc.exe) 控制項。You can compile the control with the Visual Basic Compiler (vbc.exe) or C# Compiler (csc.exe). 下列程式碼範例所示，您必須在 Web 專案的 Bin 目錄中放置產生的.dll 檔案。You must place the resulting .dll file in the Bin directory of the Web project, as shown in the following code example. ```vb vbc /r:System.dll /r:System.Web.dll /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/bin/vb_myDataBoundLiteralControl.dll myDataBoundLiteralControl.vb ``` ```csharp csc /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/bin/cs_myDataBoundLiteralControl.dll myDataBoundLiteralControl.cs ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何註冊並.aspx 檔案中使用自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates how the custom control is registered and used within an .aspx file. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl/CS/databoundform.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_DataBoundLiteralControl/VB/databoundform.aspx#2)]
